p: The significant differences of the means of experimental groups were determined using one-way ANOVA followed by Duncanâ€™s multiple range test ( P < 0.05). All data analyses were performed using SAS software version 9.4. Pearson correlation analysis was conducted by SPSS software version 21 (SPSS Inc., Chicago, IL, USA). Biplot chart was drawn by Minitab 16 statistical software. The experiment was carried out in three replicates.
